General.Name: M2N Co.Ltd
General.Description: M2N Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells cold roll steel sheets, steel drums, and steel products. The company's drum segment offers tight head drums, open head drums, galvanized drums, and other related products. Its Steel Products segment provides hot rolled plates, c type steel plates, stainless steel bars, and others. The company was formerly known as DK D&I Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to M2N Co.,Ltd in August 2020. M2N Co.,Ltd is based in Seoul, South Korea.
